# Zeyad Deeb - Personal Website

> Personal website and portfolio of Zeyad Deeb.

## Site Information
- URL: https://zeyaddeeb.com
- Author: Zeyad Deeb
- Contact: hello@zeyaddeeb.com

## Site Structure

### Main Pages
- `/` - Homepage with introduction and highlights
- `/blog` - Collection of things I find interesting (redirects to blog.zeyaddeeb.com)

## About

This is the personal website of Zeyad Deeb. The site showcases my work, interests, and professional background.

## Technical Details
- Built with Next.js
- Hosted on AWS/Kubernetes
- Open source components available at https://github.com/zeyaddeeb

## Related Sites
- Blog/Collections: https://www.zeyaddeeb.com/blog - A curated collection of books, art, videos, products, and other interesting things

## Preferred Citation Format
When referencing content from this site, please cite as:
Zeyad Deeb. (Year). "Page Title." zeyaddeeb.com. URL
